Levels.show_cross: Display an image of a cross character on the screen.
Levels.show_dash: Display an image of a dash character on the screen.
Levels.show_letter: Display a letter on the screen.

Levels.bad_trial: This event is part of a bad or incomplete trial. Some of the expected trial events are missing.
Levels.feedback_correct: Feedback that the last participant response was correct.
Levels.feedback_incorrect: Feedback that the last participant response was incorrect.
Levels.ignored_correct: The participant correctly indicated that the probe was not a target.
Levels.ignored_incorrect: The participant indicated that the probe was not a target but the probe was a target.
Levels.indicate_ready: The participant presses a button to indicate ready.
Levels.probe_not_shown: The probe letter was not shown in the trial.
Levels.probe_target: The probe letter was a target to be remembered.
Levels.remembered_correct: Participant correctly indicated that the probe was a target.
Levels.remembered_incorrect: Participant indicated that the probe was a target but the probe was not a target.
Levels.to_ignore: This probe letter is not a target.
Levels.to_remember: This probe letter is a target.
Levels.work_memory: Cue to indicate that a probe letter is coming.

trial.Description: Number of the trial in the experiment

letter.Description: The character appearing on the screen

memory_cond.Description: Number of letters that must be paid attention to or remembered.

sample.Description: Number of the sample taken in acquisition relative to EEG with first sample being 1.
